snippet: The suspect, a 22-year-old Moroccan, is accused of involvement in the March attack in which 21 tourists were killed at the National Bardo Museum.
abstract: Italian police announce arrest of Moroccan man Abdelmajid Touil, suspected of involvement in attack on a museum in Tunisia in March that killed 22 people; charges against Touil could include terrorism and murder.
lead_paragraph: The suspect, a 22-year-old Moroccan, is accused of involvement in the March attack in which 21 tourists were killed at the National Bardo Museum.

headline.main: Tunisia Museum Attack Suspect Arrested in Italy
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Italy: Suspect in Tunisia Attack Arrested
